text.update: UPDATE DataTexts SET text=? WHERE id=?;

date.update: UPDATE DataDates SET datetime=? WHERE id=?;

boolean.update: UPDATE DataBooleans SET value=? WHERE id=?;

number.update: UPDATE DataNumbers SET value=? WHERE id=?;

update.link: UPDATE DataLinks SET link=? WHERE id=?;
update.content_type: UPDATE DataLinks SET content_type=? WHERE id=?;
update.type: UPDATE DataLinks SET type=? WHERE id=?;

complexe.update: UPDATE DataComplexes SET name=? WHERE id=?;

model.update: UPDATE DataModels SET name=? WHERE id=?;

complexe_data.update: UPDATE Complexes_Data SET data=? WHERE parent=? AND label=?;
complexe_data.delete: DELETE FROM Complexes_Data WHERE parent=? AND label=?;
complexe_data.get: SELECT data FROM Complexes_Data WHERE parent=? AND label=?;

model_data.delete: DELETE FROM Models_Data WHERE parent=? AND label=? AND data=?;
model_data.get: SELECT data FROM Models_Data WHERE parent=? AND label=?;
